馼字的基本解释

馼
wén
红鬃、白身、黄眼的马。

馼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wén］
［《廣韻》無分切，平文，微。］
(1)赤鬣白身黄目的马。
(2)毛色有文彩的马。

馼字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　馼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1435第05
【唐韻】【集韻】?無分切，音文。【玉篇】馬不純。【說文】馬赤鬣縞身，目若黃金，名曰馼。吉皇之乗，周文王時犬戎獻之。　【六書略】或書作?。

馼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

馼字的起名意思

红鬃、白身、黄眼的马，也指古代的神马。

[①]［wén］
["Guangyun" has no division, plain text, micro. ]

(2) Horses with colorful coats.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　馼; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1435 05
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? No segmentation, phonetic text. [Jade articles] The horse is not pure. [Speaking text] Ma Chi has a sturdy body, and his eyes are like gold, and his name is 馼. Ji Huang's ride, Zhou Wen's dog Rong Xianzhi.　【Six Books Abbreviated】or book creation?.

Name meaning
The horse with red mane, white body and yellow eyes also refers to the ancient god horse.
